location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], to Edward Galley, Resident, and Charles Watkins, Factor, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter encloses the following:a copy of a letter from William Bruere, Public Department at the Council Chamber in Bengal, to Samuel Manesty, dated 14 Februuary 1787;an extract of a letter from Charles Cornwallis, the Governor General of the Presidency of Fort William, to the Presidency of Bombay, dated 12 March 1787;a copy of a letter from Samuel Manesty to the Charles Cornwallis, dated 12 Aug 1787.All documents are concerned with the collecting of botanical samples for a new botanical garden in Bengal, including instructions for what plants are required from the Persian Gulf region, and the expertise needed for their cultivation.
